actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the unborn, the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - States that neither the United States nor any State shall deprive any human being, from the moment of conception, of life without due process and equal protection of the laws. Directs that neither shall the United States nor any State deprive any human being of life on account of illness, age or incapacity.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the unborn, the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
